item.description:
We've changed our monthly dinner and business meeting to a Thursday evening to accomodate a couple of the officer's schedules. Since it's Thursday, we are going to start a little earlier than usual -- 6:30 PM.

We'll meet at Gloria's home in Windsor. Address and directions will be sent to those who RSVP.

If you'd like to bring something to complement the planned pasta entree -- appetizer, green salad, garlic bread, dessert or beverages -- please make a note on your RSVP.
item.name: Dinner and a meeting
